title: 2022 Scott Spark gets Bold new redesign as a slack, fast, fully-integrated 120mm XC bike
content:
The all-new 2022 Scott Spark gives a ground-up redesign to one of the winningest XC race bikes ever built, now slacker with longer travel and no rear shock in sight. The all-new 120mm travel cross-country mountain bike also takes a big leap in versatility, moving from racing modern technical XC tracks to fast trail riding [â€¦]
